verses.name: Psalms 40:1
verses.text: I waited patiently for the Lord; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.

verses.name: Psalms 40:2
verses.text: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.

verses.name: Psalms 40:3
verses.text: And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 40:4
verses.text: Blessed is that man that maketh the Lord his trust, and respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.
